jointyc.analysis.semantic

Class SemanticAnalyzer

  • java.lang.Object
    • jointyc.analysis.semantic.SemanticAnalyzer

  • public class SemanticAnalyzer
extends java.lang.Object
    Implements a visiting machinery of the syntax tree to apply semantic actions, defined by the interpreter associated at construction time.
    Author:
    Salvatore Giampà

    • Method Detail

      • analyze

        public java.lang.Object analyze(SyntaxTree tree)
                         throws SemanticException
        Implements the iterative algorithm that visits the specified syntax tree and calls the semantic actions on the interpreter
        Parameters:
        tree - the syntax tree root to analyze
        Returns:
        the result of semantic analysis or null
        Throws:
        SemanticException - if the interpreter discovers semantic errors
        AxiomResultException - if more than one result are returned by the axiom semantic action
